name: Mayflower
long_description: Mayflower is creating an AI-native visa preparation experience with a 100% O-1 success rate among our founding team. We can take a traditional 4-6 month process to under a week when the profile is ready, with arguments based on recent approval patterns. We offer tailored profile-building services and provide clients with transparency into their case status at all times to ensure a seamless experience.
one_liner: End-to-end visa filing in hours, not months
